content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While appreciating your interest in the apartment, let's focus solely on the rental price discussion for now. To initiate our negotiation, I have an initial offer in mind. Please tell me if you find this acceptable or propose a different number. 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' or let me know if you don't want to continue due to specific reasons if unsatisfied.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I appreciate that. Let's say 650 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't find your proposed amount sufficiently high enough for my expectations, Emilia Müller. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
